rows.label: tlk43400443_01_msg0001
rows.name: I'm asking for rations again today.

rows.label: tlk43400443_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Because of the war, the Invidian Army
is restricting sales of food and things
are getting more and more expensive.

rows.label: tlk43400443_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I just can't get vegetables
like I used to.

rows.label: tlk43400443_01_msg0004
rows.name:
But it's all going toward
Invidia's victory in the war.

rows.label: tlk43400443_01_msg0005
rows.name:
And there's lots of people
working as soldiers and
mercenaries in Fons Maim...

rows.label: tlk43400443_01_msg0006
rows.name:
That includes lots of people I
know. We all have to do our bit.
